data.name: Siqura
data.description: It is our mission to bring uncomplicated clarity to the men and women watching over our safety. We do this by helping them to make error-free decisions during critical situations. We believe that uncomplicated clarity in video surveillance can truly contribute to a superior response and thus a safer society for all.
